ItemWeapon.name: Atom smasher
ItemWeapon.description: A man portable nuclear weapon, the atom smasher initiates the fission of a small isotope pellet. The resultant energy is funneled outwards in the general direction of a target both to cause damage and so as not to inflict radiation damage on the wielder. 6-12 thermal damage.

missText.text: TARGET manages to avoid the irradiative blast

hitText.text: you blast TARGET for VALUE radiation damage
